detail.how_to_use:
Your gift card cannot be presented on the day for payment, you must pre-purchase products and tickets online by following the super easy steps below: 

1) Visit https://www.altontowers.com/ to make your purchase
2) You can add any products or services to your cart e.g entry tickets, short breaks, fastrack etc.
3) At checkout, select 'Pay by debit/credit card' and select the Mastercard option if prompted
4) Enter the 16-digit card number on the back of the card
5) Use the gift card expiry date for the payment card expiry field and the CVC2 number for the CVV field. These can also be found on the back of your card
6) Once completed, an order confirmation will be emailed to you along with any digital products or entry tickets to present on the day of your visit

Please note: You can only use your gift card for the whole value of the transaction. Part payment is not possible for online purchases so please ensure you have sufficient balance to cover the whole transaction. You can ‘top up’ your gift card by visiting https://merlingiftcard.co.uk.

For full T&Cs: https://www.merlingiftcard.co.uk/t-cs/

The supply of gift cards is subject to Prezzee's Terms and Conditions (https://www.prezzee.uk/policies/terms-of-sale/)

detail.description: Asterley Bros are two brothers based in South London who fell in love with world of Italian liqueurs when the older brother, Rob, married into a Sicilian family. The tried their hands making Italian liqueurs for a number of years and eventually decided to create a range of English twists on the classic favourites of vermouth, amaro and negronis. They have since gone from strength to strength, with their products now being stocked in Fortnum’s and Harvey Nichols, as well as gracing the cocktail lists of some of the World’s Top 50 Best Bars. Their Creative Director, Joe Schofield has won the ‘World’s Best Bartender’ award, voted by his peers, and develops all the Asterley Bros Cocktail Range. Artisan, small batch liquids, handmade with integrity, meet one of the best cocktail makers in the world. Who could wish for more!

detail.description: As the UK’s most-loved online florist caring wildly is at the heart of Bloom & Wild. It’s in the soul of their people. That’s why their letterbox packaging is 100% recyclable. Why they offset their carbon emissions. Why they send zero waste to landfill from their warehouses. Why they treat every order like their own - with all the care in the world. Bloom & Wild exists to celebrate the little things we all do for each other every day. Not just on the big occasions. With them you can be there for the highs. Step up for the lows. Get someone out of a rut. Remember a precious memory. Find the courage to say sorry. Or silly ways to make them smile. After all, unexpected flowers are the best kind. With some companies, care is often packaged up as something cheesy and overly sentimental. But with Bloom & Wild, it goes beyond the clichés, the token gestures, the roses. To them, caring wildly is as thoughtful and beautiful as it is strong and empowering. So whether you’re thanking a friend who moonlights as your unpaid life coach or celebrating a sister who’s really more like a mum. Don’t just send flowers, care wildly
detail.balance_enquiry_info: To check your Bloom & Wild gift card balance, you can either enter the gift card code during checkout on the Bloom & Wild website or call customer support.

brands.notes: Apply your unique Bloom & Wild code into the 'Special code' box at checkout, and not as a digital gift card or voucher. Bloom & Wild gift cards can't be combined with other discounts or codes.

detail.terms_and_conditions_copy:

Open the Bolt app.
Go to the “Promotions” or “Discount Codes” section.
Enter the coupon code.

Terms of Use:

All payments are processed in the local currency of the country where Bolt services are used.
Coupons can only be redeemed in the country where they were issued.
Coupons can be replaced if necessary.

detail.description:
Buyagift is the UK's leading provider of experience days and gift experiences. If you're looking for a unique birthday gift or an extra special Christmas present, or just a novel way to mark your own special occasion then Buyagift offers an exceptional choice from which to select. 

By purchasing a gift experience for your friend or loved one you are not just giving them a thoughtful present, but also a wealth of memories to enjoy for years to come. 

A unique Buyagift experience day really is the gift that keeps on giving. From helicopter flying and cookery lessons to supercar driving and relaxing short breaks, Buyagift have everything that you could possibly need to make someone's special occasion absolutely unforgettable. 

With over 4,000 gifts and experiences to choose from, you are sure to find the perfect gift for even the most discerning loved one, whether they're an aspiring gourmet or a high-flying thrill-seeker.

Redemption Instructions:
To activate your gift card, download the free Love Local app from your app store and sign up using the same email linked to your everup account.

Once logged in:
1. Tap “Add a new gift card”
2. Tap “Activate a gift card”
3. Copy the 6-digit activation code from your everup-purchased gift card, paste it, and click “Activate gift card”.

You can then use it directly from your wallet when shopping in participating local businesses.

Redemption Instructions:
To activate your gift card, download the free Love Local app from your app store and sign up using the same email linked to your everup account.

Once logged in:
1. Tap “Add a new gift card”
2. Tap “Activate a gift card”
3. Copy the 6-digit activation code from your everup-purchased gift card, paste it, and click “Activate gift card”.

To spend your gift card, you MUST first add it to your Apple or Google Wallet via the Love Local app.

You can then use it directly from your wallet when shopping in participating local businesses.

detail.description:
Arlington, Virginia, 1986. Jerry and Janie Murrell gave their five sons a choice, “Start a business or go to college?” The business route won and the family opened the first Five Guys – named after the five brothers.
To this day, the formula remains simple, ‘Burgers and Fries cooked to perfection’, in keeping with Jerry’s philosophy of “To perfect and serve.” The Family is also still very much involved, meeting every Tuesday with every member still very much part of the business.
Five Guys is how burgers and fries are meant to be. High quality grain-fed beef, hand cut fries and as many topping combinations as you like.

brands.notes:
To view all participating local businesses that accept the Glasgow Gift Card, visit:

https://townandcitygiftcards.com/where-to-spend
Then select your town or city from the list.

Redemption Instructions:
To activate your gift card, download the free Love Local app from your app store and sign up using the same email linked to your everup account.

Once logged in:
1. Tap “Add a new gift card”
2. Tap “Activate a gift card”
3. Copy the 6-digit activation code from your everup-purchased gift card, paste it, and click “Activate gift card”.

To spend your gift card, you MUST first add it to your Apple or Google Wallet via the Love Local app.

You can then use it directly from your wallet when shopping in participating local businesses.

detail.description:
The Global Hotel Card Powered by Expedia Partner Solutions is the premier gift card for Hotels, Resorts, Vacation rentals and Private homes worldwide.  Choose from over 600,000 accommodations worldwide in over 200 countries.

Things To Know:

1.	Search our accommodations database in the currency of your gift card and book your stay online only at www.globalhotelcard.com. 

2.	Apply the 16-digit Gift Card Code and 8-digit Pin as full or partial payment of the booking. You may combine up to four gift cards per reservation.  Simply apply the value of your gift card for full or partial payment of the reservation. The balance, if necessary, may be paid with a major credit card. You may use up to four cards per booking.  Gift Cards do not expire.  

3.	Your reservations will be confirmed by email directly from Global Hotel. At check-in simply present your booking confirmation and government issued identification for the pre-paid reservation.  

4.          You may cancel your reservation ONLINE with no penalty IF the cancellation is done online at www.globalhotelcard.com and is within the rules of the cancellation policy. 

5.	If you need assistance regarding using Global Hotel Card please email us at help@globalhotelcard.com and provide as much detail as possible to help us better serve you. 

Terms and Conditions:

The Global Hotel Card is issued by Global Hotel Card, Inc. and use of the website www.GlobalHotelCard.com and gift card constitutes acceptance of these terms and conditions that may be revised at any time.  The full terms and conditions may be found at https://globalhotelcard.com/terms-and-conditions.  Gift Cards do not expire.  

Enjoy Your Stay!

detail.description:
Healthy Minds Club is a personalised health & wellbeing platform. We connect our users with highly qualified,
screened and vetted experts, products & services to prevent issues from happening in the first place, nipping
issues in the bud or helping you to achieve important wellbeing & lifestyle goals 100% based on your individual
priorities and needs.
What’s on offer
Your personalised Club Lounge will give you access to:
- Our Experts range from Counsellors, Life Coaches, Nutritionists, Personal Trainers, Menopause
Experts, Mindfulness Coaches, Yoga Experts & much more
- Educational Resources – online courses, classes, articles, eBooks & podcasts
- Club Shop – from water bottles to yoga mats, fit bits, health testing kits, mortgage & will writing
- Workshops & Experiences – for personal development & holistic experiences
- Discounts portal – off 90+ brands including all supermarkets, clothing brands & restaurants
How we support you
Our platform proactively supports you with a personalised approach to prevent Physical, Mental & Financial
Wellbeing issues by focussing on
1. Managing & reducing stress & anxiety at home & at work (Avoiding burnout, handling conflict,
managing workload, covid safety, job security financial security, optimal parenting, handling divorce,
grief management, handling bullying etc)
2. Proactively promoting health & wellbeing (optimum sleep, health, fitness & weight goals, smoking
cessation, alcohol management, overcoming menopause, realising contentment & happiness, piece of
mind, finding purpose and feeling psychologically secure)
3. Driving optimum personal development (to achieve mental toughness and avoid stress & anxiety,
drive confidence, improve self belief, achieve key life & career goals, manage imposter syndrome,
overcome limiting beliefs, surpass your comfort zone and much more….)
Look out for more exciting expert categories, wellbeing products and services from the Healthy Minds Club
offering you the first and only personalised mental health & wellbeing platform. As a Member of the Club you
will be rewarded with VIP access, ongoing support with hints & tips, offers and discounts to live your best life!

HelloFresh delivers all the fresh, seasonal ingredients and easy-to-follow recipe cards straight to your door, so you can cook up delicious dinners from scratch without visiting the supermarket - saving you time and money. 
                       With over 36 recipes to pick from each week, our classic British dishes and globally inspired meals mean we’ve got everyone covered, from the picky eaters to vegetarians.

detail.how_to_use:
1. Creed e-gift cards can be used in full or part to pay for products on [https://creedfragrances.co.uk](http://creedfragrances.co.uk) only.
2. E-gift cards are valid for a total of 12 months from the point of purchase. Any balance not used after this point, will no longer be valid and cannot be refunded or exchanged for cash.
3. An e-gift card cannot be exchanged for cash or refunded.
4. If the products purchased online total less than the value of your e-gift card, any balance will be left as credit for you on your e-gift card. If the products purchased online are equal to the total of the e-gift card, the entire e-gift card will be used automatically. E-gift cards can be used towards the purchase of goods at a higher price than its face value upon payment of the difference.
5. Where goods you have purchased with an e-gift card are subsequently exchanged for goods of a lower price or returned in full, monies owing will be issued in a new e-gift card. This does not affect your statutory rights.
6. E-Gift Cards will be sent directly to your chosen email address upon purchase. 
7. When purchasing an e-gift card you will not be charged shipping fees
8. E-gift cards are not available to purchase to customers located outside of the UK mainland.
If you have any issues with using your e-gift card, please contact Creed Customer Services on customerservices@creedfragrances.co.uk or call +44 330 053 2398
9. We will not accept any liability for lost or for any remaining balance on the e-gift card. If you have made an online payment with an e-gift card in whole or part and any item paid for using the e-gift card is accepted for return the amount owed will be returned in e-gift card balance rather than a cash refund.

The supply of gift cards is subject to Prezzee's Terms and Conditions (https://www.prezzee.uk/policies/terms-of-sale/)

detail.terms_and_conditions_copy:
IKEA Digital Gift Card Terms & Conditions
Terms and conditions for Gift Cards issued in the UK
Gift and Refund cards(s) can be used at any IKEA store in:
Belgium, Canada, Czech Republic, Croatia, Denmark, Finland, Hungary, Italy, Ireland, the Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain*, Sweden, Switzerland and the UK.
*With the exception of the stores in Ibiza, Balearic Islands, Lanzarote, Tenerife, Mallorca and Gran Canaria.
	•	Some Gift Cards can only be redeemed in the same country of issue.  For further details visit the IKEA Website of the issuing country for their Terms & Conditions
	•	The minimum value needed to activate a digital IKEA Gift Card is £5 and the maximum value that can be stored on an IKEA Gift card is £1000. 
	•	To check the balance of any Gift or Refund card(s), you can check online or visit any IKEA store.
	•	No cash change will be given on purchases made using a Gift or Refund card(s).
	•	Gift cards cannot be returned or refunded, except in accordance with your legal rights. The balance cannot be converted into cash.
	•	The value on the card(s) cannot be used to pay credit card or IKEA Business account balances.
	•	The balance on the card(s) can be controlled at any IKEA store, or by the phone via the Contact Centre.
	•	The card(s) remain the property of IKEA UK and Ireland Ltd, and may not be tampered or interfered with, without our consent.
	•	Gift card(s) can be used as a complete or partial payment in all the above IKEA stores including online.
	•	There are no limitations on how many times a card(s) can be used (until the balance is £0.00).
	•	The card(s) have no expiration date.
	•	If card(s) are found, please return to the nearest IKEA store.
	•	IKEA is unable to replace card(s) if lost, damaged or stolen.

Redemption Instructions:
To activate your gift card, download the free Love Local app from your app store and sign up using the same email linked to your everup account.

Once logged in:
1. Tap “Add a new gift card”
2. Tap “Activate a gift card”

3) At checkout, select 'Pay by debit/credit card' and select the Mastercard option if prompted
4) Enter the 16-digit card number on the back of the card
5) Use the gift card expiry date for the payment card expiry field and the CVC2 number for the CVV field. These can also be found on the back of your card

What is a Lululemon Gift Card?
A Lululemon Gift Card is a digital gift card that you can redeem online or at any Lululemon store. Give them choice of their next training gear updates with a Lululemon Gift Card.

How does a Lululemon Gift Card from Prezzee work?
Select the desired card value and tap Gift for 'Myself' or 'Someone else'.
Optional: Upload a video, GIF, or audio file.
Optional: Write a personal greeting.
Choose to deliver the gift card instantly via email or SMS, or schedule a specific delivery day and time.

How do I check my Lululemon Gift Card balance?
To check the balance on your digital Lululemon Gift Card, log in to your Prezzee Wallet or open your eGift Card from the gift email we sent you. If the balance is not automatically updated, select 'Update Balance' or 'Check Balance' and follow the prompts to complete your balance check for your Lululemon Gift Card.

Can you use a Lululemon Gift Card online?
Yes, the digital Lululemon Gift Card from Prezzee can be used online at the Lululemon website and in-store for any Lululemon purchases.

Where can you use a Lululemon Gift Card?
A Prezzee Lululemon Gift Card can be redeemed online or at any Lululemon store across the UK.

Does a Lululemon Gift Card expire?
No, a Prezzee Lululemon Gift Card is valid indefinitely.

brands.name: Merlin Gift Card

detail.description:
Creating memorable and magical experiences at the UK’s biggest and BEST attractions.
A Merlin Gift Card is your ultimate passport that unlocks EPIC togetherness at over 30 of the UK’s most loved attractions! From aquariums to theme parks, dungeons to historic buildings, there are a huge variety of attractions to enjoy across the UK. Merlin Entertainments have put all of their energy into creating magical memories for their guests. With over 60 million visitors every year, that’s a lot of unforgettable moments.
From the magical worlds of LEGOLAND Windsor Resort and Alton Towers Resort to the fascinating depths of SEA LIFE aquariums and the immersive fun of Madame Tussauds, the Merlin Gift Card opens the door to endless possibilities. Valid with all of Merlin's UK attractions, simply hop online and use your gift card to purchase entry tickets, hotel stays and other extras at the BEST attractions across the country.
To use your Merlin Gift Card, simply visit the website of your chosen attraction, select your tickets or other products, and proceed to checkout. At checkout, enter your gift card details just as you would with a debit/credit card. It’s that easy! Plus, your gift card is valid for 12 months, giving you plenty of time to plan your perfect adventure.

Your gift card cannot be presented on the day for payment, you must pre-purchase products and tickets online by following the super easy steps below: 

1) Visit merlingiftcard.co.uk to browse all available attractions 
2) Once decided, visit your chosen attractions direct website to make your purchase
3) You can add any products or services to your cart e.g entry tickets, short breaks, fastrack etc.
4) At checkout, select 'Pay by debit/credit card' and select the Mastercard option if prompted
5) Enter the 16-digit card number on the back of the card
6) Use the 'online code' for the expiry date and the CVC2 number for the CVV field. These can also be found on the back of your card
7) Once completed, an order confirmation will be emailed to you along with any digital products or entry tickets to present on the day of your visit

Please note: You can only use your gift card for the whole value of the transaction. Part payment is not possible for online purchases so please ensure you have sufficient balance to cover the whole transaction. You can ‘top up’ your gift card by visiting merlingiftcard.co.uk.

brands.notes: The Merlin gift card can only be used be used to pre-book attractions or buy a Merlin Annual Pass on merlingiftcard.co.uk. It cannot be used for on-site payments. To use your gift card, open it, copy the Card number, PIN, and Expiry date, then enter them into the Pay with Card, Expiration and CVV boxes at checkout on the Merlin Gift Card site. You can only use one gift card per online transaction, and it must cover the entire purchase amount. It can't be used for part payment.

detail.description:
Treat the Nando's enthusiast in your life with a Prezzee Nando's Gift Card! Now they won't have to hold back on their favourites when enjoying their next Nando's feast. Let them enjoy all the sides, mains and treats they could hope for with a Nando's Gift Card. Take the cheeky out of cheeky Nando's with a Nando's Gift Card that will have your giftee feeling spoilt (and well fed!).

What is a Nando's Gift Card?
A Nando's eGift Card is a digital gift card that you can redeem online or at any Nando's restaurant. Give them endless choice for lunch or dinner with a Nando's Gift Card.

How does a Nando's Gift Card from Prezzee work?
Select the desired card value and tap Gift for 'Myself' or 'Someone else'.
Optional: Upload a video, GIF, or audio file.
Optional: Write a personal greeting.
Choose to deliver the gift card instantly via email or SMS, or schedule a specific delivery day and time.

How do I check my Nando's Gift Card balance?
To check the balance on your digital Nando's Gift Card, log in to your Prezzee Wallet or open your eGift Card from the gift email we sent you. If the balance is not automatically updated, select 'Update Balance' or 'Check Balance' and follow the prompts to complete your balance check for your Nando's Gift Card.

Can you use a Nando's Gift Card online?
Yes, the digital Nando's Gift Card from Prezzee can be used online and in any Nando's restaurant.

Where can you use a Nando's Gift Card?
A Prezzee Nando's Gift Card can only be redeemed for Nando's purchased made within England, Scotland, Wales or Northern Ireland.

Does a Nando's Gift Card expire?
Yes, a Prezzee Nando's Gift Card is valid for 18 months.

At Rewards.Earth we provide a platform for individuals to offset their personal carbon emissions by planting trees in the UK and overseas, our UK trees are planted by The Green Task Force which is made up of veterans who are transitioning from the armed services. 

                        Many of these veterans suffer from conditions such as PTS, The Green Task force provides them a pathway to nationally recognised qualifications and ultimately employment, whilst assisting in their rehabilitation and reintegration through ‘Nature Based Therapy”, with proven success. 

                        Our overseas projects provide reforestation in some of the most environmentally challenged areas of the globe, helping people, communities and wildlife. 

                        Memberships can be paid for monthly or annually and start at less than £1 a week, our members get full access to our digital platform where they can monitor the amount of trees they have planted the amount of CO2 they are offsetting. 

                        In addition to this, as part of the Rewards.Earth ecosystem, they will receive regular newsletters, video content and frequent posts on our social media platforms. These will keep them informed of the projects supported worldwide.

THE POWER OF RITUALS

They are everywhere: at any given moment, of every single day, waiting to be discovered, eager to share the beauty within them. They are the seemingly meaningless moments we all tend to overlook.

Rituals unveils these moments and reminds you to experience them with joy. Whether it’s taking a nice long bath or creating a homey atmosphere with the rich scent of Asian incense, Rituals allows you to find happiness in the smallest of things.

OUR PRODUCTS

Inspired by the wisdom and ancient traditions of Asian cultures, we created an extensive collection of luxurious yet affordable products for home and body. We hope to enrich your life using unique signature fragrances that are carefully designed and composed by the world’s finest perfumers.

PERFECT GIFTS

Whether you purchase a gift for yourself or for someone else, choosing the perfect gift is a breeze with our luxurious collection of home and body products. With Rituals you give more than just a present; you give the experience of finding happiness in the smallest of things. We believe that is how meaningful moments are created.

1. This gift card can be used as full or part payment for any goods in all UK stores and online at schuh.co.uk.

2. No change or refunds will be given but any balance on the card may be applied to future purchase. 

3. Please look after this Gift card and treat it like cash. We cannot replace or reimburse the balance if it is lost or stolen. 

4. Gift card can only be used in the currency in which it was purchased. 

5. This card is not redeemable for cash. 

6. Gift cards are issued by schuh Limited, 1 Neilson Square, Livingston, EH54 8RQ. If you have any queries, please contact our Customer Experience department on 0207 100 1515.

Full Terms and Conditions
1. Once activated, this gift card can be used as full or part payment for any goods in all UK and Irish stores, and online at www.schuh.co.uk, www.schuh.ie and www.schuh.eu 

2. The minimum amount needed to activate gift card is £1 and the maximum value which can be placed on a gift card is £300.

3. Gift cards can only be used where the currency with which they are charged is legal tender. Cards charged with sterling can only be used in the UK and online at www.schuh.co.uk.

4. No change or refunds will be given, but any balance on the card may be applied to future purchases. Where goods purchased with the card are subsequently returned or exchanged, monies owing will be added to the balance on your card.

5. Please look after the gift card and treat it like cash. We do not collect and maintain information on the holders of gift cards and so, if your gift card is used without your consent, lost, stolen or damaged we cannot replace or reimburse the balance on the gift card.

6. schuh Ltd reserves the right to vary these terms and conditions, or end this scheme with reasonable notice. We will give such notice by notices displayed in-stores, on the www.schuh.co.uk website or otherwise.

7. Gift cards are issued by schuh Limited, 1 Neilson Square, Livingston, EH54 8RQ. If you have any queries, please contact our Customer Experience Department on 0207 100 1515.
detail.description:
Schuh is one of the leading fashion footwear retailers with over 120 stores in the UK, Ireland and online, selling over 80 of the hottest brands alongside their own label collection. 
The stores offer a unique shopping experience, known for their distinctive in-store atmosphere and excellent customer service. The website delivers a seamless multi-channel experience with best-in-class shipping, free delivery to store in as little as 20 minutes and an always-on 1-year return period. 
Across its adult and kids ranges Schuh offers an extensive range of products with access to the best brands and the latest styles.

Founded in 1984 in Macclesfield, Scotts Menswear began as a sports gear store and quickly became known for its branded footwear and casual fashion. It offers a curated selection of brands like adidas Originals, Lacoste, and Fred Perry, blending sport, music, and fashion.

Redemption Instructions:
To activate your gift card, download the free Love Local app from your app store and sign up using the same email linked to your everup account.

Once logged in:
1. Tap “Add a new gift card”
2. Tap “Activate a gift card”
3. Copy the 6-digit activation code from your everup-purchased gift card, paste it, and click “Activate gift card”.

Welcome to Sizzling pubs, where good food and drink, great value and a generous serving of sizzle are always on the menu.

Whether you're looking for a fun family meal out or somewhere to watch the footy with a few mates, you'll find a Sizzling pub to suit you - and with prices that are as easy-going as the atmosphere.

Since '82, Snow+Rock has been the home of snowsports in the UK. We're the place for expert ski boot fittings, introducing the UK's first Ski Boot Fit Clinic back in 1985 and we've been perfecting the craft ever since. It's the place to find the best snow brands under one roof, carefully chosen because we know they perform when it matters. In-store, you’ll find snow gear experts who live for winter as much as you do. The tech has evolved loads over four decades, but one thing hasn't changed - our love for snow. Whether you're booking a boot fitting, getting custom insoles, or talking through your setup with our passionate team, we're here to help you make the most of every day on the mountain. detail.terms_and_conditions_copy:
1. Tapi Carpets & Floors Gift Cards can be used as payment towards products and services from Tapi Carpets & Floors Stores within the UK. Tapi Carpets & Floors Gift Cards can be used as full or part payment. Gift cards cannot be used for telephone or online purchases
2. Tapi Carpets & Floors Gift Cards may not be exchanged for cash, vouchers or more Tapi Carpets & Floors Gift Cards.
3. The minimum amount to activate this card is £10 and the maximum credit amount is £1000.
4. There is no right to cancel an online Gift Card order once the Gift Card has been spent in full or part.
5. The Gift Card will expire 12 months after the date of issue and any remaining balance will be deducted. Tapi Carpets & Floors will not be responsible for money not redeemed before expiry.
6. Gift Cards which are defaced, altered or cancelled will not be accepted. Tapi Carpets & Floors reserves the right to any remedy, including refusal to honour a Gift Card, in the event of suspected fraud.
7. If any product purchased with a gift card is subsequently returned for a refund or exchanged for a product of lower price or a refund, any money owing will be issued as a balance reload or a new gift card. Purchases made with gift cards are not refundable in cash.
8. A Tapi Carpets & Floors Gift Card remains the property of Tapi Carpets & Floors Ltd.
9. Tapi Carpets & Floors cannot be held liable for Gift Cards, once activated, which are subsequently lost, stolen, damaged or defaced.
10. The funds on a Gift Card are not covered by the Financial Services Compensation Scheme. In the unlikely event of the issuer of this product becoming insolvent some funds on the card may not be available to spend.
11. In the event a Gift Card is non-functional, your sole remedy, and our sole liability, will be the replacement of such Gift Card.
12. Tapi Carpets & Floors reserves the right to amend these terms and conditions from time to time where it reasonably considers it necessary to do so (e.g. to change the scope of the Gift Card service, including cancellation of the Gift Card service, if necessary, in return for an appropriate refund. Reasonable notice of such changes will be given where possible.
13. By activating and/or redeeming a Tapi Carpets & Floors Gift Card you accept and agree to these terms and conditions. These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with UK law, and your purchase, receipt, and/or redemption of a Gift Card is subject to UK law.
14. The balance of the Gift Card can be checked in any Tapi Carpets & Floors store or online at https://public.inspireddeck.co.uk/ via balance checker.
detail.description: Tapi Carpets & Floors Ltd was founded in 2015 by a handful of industry flooring specialists passionate about putting customers first and blowing a breath of fresh air into the world of carpet and floor shopping. Including the Harris Family, their mission was to make buying flooring reassuringly simple and to inspire and delight customers with exceptional and innovative products and services. Tapi’s focus and commitment to flooring innovation and customer satisfaction has led to their growth of more than 170 bright and airy showrooms bursting with design inspiration and fleet of over 160 mobile showrooms to provide a home shopping service to their customers.

detail.description: The Dungeons are a uniquely thrilling attraction that will whisk you way back to the UK’s most perilous past. detail.how_to_use:
Your gift card cannot be presented on the day for payment, you must pre-purchase products and tickets online by following the super easy steps below: 

1) Visit https://www.thedungeons.com/ to browse UK locations 
2) Select your chosen location and visit the website to make your purchase
3) You can add any products or services to your cart e.g entry tickets, short breaks, fastrack etc.
4) At checkout, select 'Pay by debit/credit card' and select the Mastercard option if prompted
5) Enter the 16-digit card number on the back of the card
6) Use the gift card expiry date for the payment card expiry field and the CVC2 number for the CVV field. These can also be found on the back of your card
7) Once completed, an order confirmation will be emailed to you along with any digital products or entry tickets to present on the day of your visit

Please note: You can only use your gift card for the whole value of the transaction. Part payment is not possible for online purchases so please ensure you have sufficient balance to cover the whole transaction. You can ‘top up’ your gift card by visiting https://topup.merlingiftcard.co.uk/.

detail.description:

The largest inventory of any gift card for tours, activities, and experiences.  

Enjoy the possibilities with over 350,000 things to do including:
•	Tours and Sightseeing  
•	Attractions and Theme Parks
•	Food, Wine, and Nightlife
•	Classes & Workshops
•	Cruises, Sailing & Water Tours
•	Walking & Biking Tours
•	Transfers & Ground Transport
•	Cultural & Theme Tours
•	Spa, Yoga & Wellness

Things to Know:

1.	Search our accommodations database in the currency of your gift card and book your stay online only at www.globalexperiencescard.com. 

2.	Apply the 16-digit Gift Card Code and 8-digit Pin as full or partial payment of the booking. You may combine up to four gift cards per reservation.  Simply apply the value of your gift card for full or partial payment of the booking. The balance, if necessary, may be paid with a major credit card. Gift Cards do not expire.  

3.	Your booking will be confirmed by email directly from Global Experiences Card. Simply present your booking confirmation and identification for the pre-paid reservation.  

4.	You may cancel your booking ONLINE with no penalty IF the cancellation is done online at www.globalexperiencescard.com and is within the rules of the cancellation policy. 

5.	If you need assistance regarding using Global Experiences Card please email us at help@globalexperiencescard.com and provide as much detail as possible to help us better serve you. 

Terms and Conditions:

The Global Experiences Card Powered by Viator is issued by Global Hotel Card, Inc. and use of the website https://www.globalexperiencescard.com/ and gift card constitutes acceptance of these terms and conditions that may be revised at any time.  The full terms and conditions may be found at https://www.globalexperiencescard.com/terms-and-conditions.  Gift Cards do not expire.  

Enjoy Your Experience!

brands.name: The Royal Horticultural Society

detail.digital_general_restrictions: HS e-Gift Cards can be used only to purchase eligible items at RHS retail outlets and RHS Plants online, and cannot be redeemed against RHS Membership, RHS shows tickets, RHS Garden visit tickets or other RHS products.
detail.description:
Since our formation in 1804, the RHS has grown into the UK’s leading gardening charity, touching the lives of millions of people. Perhaps the secret to our longevity is that we’ve never stood still. In the last decade alone we’ve taken on the largest hands-on project the RHS has ever tackled by opening the new RHS Garden Bridgewater in Salford, Greater Manchester, and invested in the science that underpins all our work by building RHS Hilltop – The Home of Gardening Science.
We have committed to being net positive for nature and people by 2030. We are also committed to being truly inclusive and to reflect all the communities of the UK.
Across our five RHS gardens we welcome more than three million visitors each year to enjoy over 34,000 different cultivated plants. Events such as the world famous RHS Chelsea Flower Show, other national shows, our schools and community work, and partnerships such as Britain in Bloom, all spread the shared joy of gardening to wide-reaching audiences.
Throughout it all we’ve held true to our charitable core – to encourage and improve the science, art, and practice of horticulture –to share the love of gardening and the positive benefits it brings.
We are solely funded by our members, visitors, and supporters.

brands.notes: RHS gift cards can only be used for eligible items at RHS retail outlets and RHS plants online, but cannot be used for RHS Membership, show tickets, garden visit tickets, or other RHS products.

detail.description:
Unlike traditional gift options, where you can simply pick something off the shelf, finding a suitable vegan gift requires careful consideration. You need to ensure that the product is free from animal products and by-products, and that it has not been tested on animals - the task can seem insurmountable, leaving you feeling lost and unsure of what to buy.

Fortunately, with The Vegan Gift Card, you can give the gift of choice and allow your loved one to pick from a range of carefully selected vegan brands meaning they will end up with a gift that they love and more importantly that they can actually use.

Buying gifts for a vegan friend or relative can be a tricky task. Valid for 18 months from date of purchase.

Over 22 Years ago, Chrissie Rucker had a vision: to create a company that specialised in stylish, white homewares, combining the highest quality with affordable prices. She envisioned creating a seamless shopping experience across every channel, from beautiful stores to online, making customers feel wonderfully welcome at every touchpoint. What started as a range of white essentials for the linen cupboard - plump duvets, crisp sheets and fluffy towels - has gradually grown into the ultimate luxury lifestyle destination for your home, wardrobe, and little ones. From waking up in crisp white sheets to the feel of whisper-soft cashmere against your skin, we believe in using the very best you can afford, every single day, seeking pleasure in the simplest of moments.

detail.description:
Here at Toby, we believe there's only one way to do our beloved Great British roast - and that's properly.

Every day, your local Toby Carvery lays on a family-sized feast of tender, slow-cooked meats, eight lots of veg including crispy, ruffled roasties and all the trimmings. So you can enjoy your favourite carvery meal just the way you like it, whenever you like it. You'll find lots more on offer, such as tasty specials, all-you-can-eat breakfasts and even comfy accommodation at some of our restaurants.  Every spud is checked by hand and ruffled for extra crunch. All of our meat is slow-cooked and basted to succulent perfection. And our Yorkshires are freshly made in our kitchens and served crisp, fluffy and piping-hot to your plate. That's what makes us the home of the roast.

Treatwell Gift Cards expire on the date specified on each card. Treatwell Gift Cards can be spent on all services on https://www.treatwell.co.uk/ and the Treatwell app. Treatwell Gift Cards are only valid in the UK. Recipients can enter the code in the special field at the check-out when making a purchase. They will then be asked to create a Treatwell account so they do not lose any remaining credit. The Treatwell Gift Card can be used for any amount and if the remaining credit is insufficient, simply pay the difference with the payment method of your choice. detail.description:
Creating Joy From Grape To Glass - this is our brand purpose and why we exist. It’s what we aspire to bring to every single person involved along our journey. From our winemakers in the vineyard, to the partners we work with, and of course, our happy customers, it’s all about joyful experiences.

Since launching in 2000, we've sold over 100 million bottles to wine lovers in the UK, offering every style imaginable, catering to all palates and preferences. We've built our range over the years by working hand in hand with talented winemakers across the globe to create and source exclusive wines that are a joy to drink.

We're on a mission to be the UK's most rewarding wine retailer. To be the feel-good place to get great wine. To bring joy to all our customers.!

Everything we do is driven by what our customers prefer. So instead of selling what we think they'll want, we combine our expertise with their feedback to continuously shape our range of over 700 wines and make more of what they love. It's part of what makes Virgin Wines different - and means that over 90% of our wines are exclusive to us.

Our expert team of award-winning buyers work closely with the best and most exciting independent winemakers around the world, taste testing until they're red in the teeth. We're involved in every stage in the process and have an active role in blending many of our own wines, too. With over 200,000 five-star wine ratings on our website and 16,000 five-star reviews on Trustpilot, we'd like to think we're on the right tracks.

Looking after our customers is so important to us, but we also do our best to care for the planet and ensure everyone in our community is happy and treated fairly. From adopting environmentally friendly practices to supporting charities, our pledge is to have a positive impact on all our surroundings.

We wouldn't be Virgin if we didn't go the extra mile. Not only have we made ordering wine online easy and enjoyable, we also connect our customers to other Virgin brands. Through us, wine lovers can unlock a world of possibilities, from cruises and luxury hotels to balloon flights and other unforgettable experiences. They can also earn Virgin Red loyalty points when buying our wines, too.

No cash change will be given following the use of the card, but any outstanding balance will remain on the card and can be used against future purchases.

Gift cards cannot be used for on-line, telephone purchases or mail order purchases.

Gift cards cannot be returned, refunded or exchanged for cash, except in accordance with your legal rights

Gift cards cannot be used for the following purchases:

Tool Hire
Any products sold in Wickes in store concessions
Specialist Installations
Paying for or paying off any outstanding Wickes financial loans for Kitchens or Bathrooms.
Wickes reserves the right to refuse to accept a gift card which it deems to have been tampered with, duplicated, damaged or which is otherwise suspected of being used for fraudulent purposes.

You can top up your Wickes gift card by going to your local store. The minimum amount required to top up is £10 and the maximum amount that can be loaded at any one time is £10,000. The maximum value that can be held on a Wickes gift card at any time is £10,000'. E-gift cards cannot be topped up.

Please note that gift card limits may differ, please check with your gift card provider for details.

Customers must be present with the gift card at the point of purchase.

If this card remains inactive for 24 months or more it will be cancelled and any balance forfeited. An inactive card is a card which has not been used for any purchase, refund or top up.

Customers should treat gift card as cash. Wickes cannot be held liable for Wickes gift cards, once activated, loaded and/or topped up, which are subsequently lost, stolen, damaged or defaced; nor will Wickes be liable for any amounts remaining on such cards.

If a gift card is lost or stolen please contact Wickes on 0330 123 4123. In the event that a registered gift card is reported lost or stolen, Wickes may transfer any remaining balance at the time of the lost or stolen card being reported to a new card for the customer.

Customers may check their balance at www.showmybalance.com

Wickes reserves the right to amend these terms and conditions from time to time where it reasonably considers it necessary to do so (e. g. to change the scope of the gift card service, notify of the service's withdrawal, cancellation of a gift card or in the event of circumstances beyond its control). Reasonable notice of such changes will be given where possible.

Wickes gift cards are not cheque guarantee, credit or charge cards.

By activating and/or redeeming a Wickes gift card the customer accepts and agrees to these terms and conditions. Nothing in these terms and conditions shall affect your statutory rights.
detail.description: Wickes is proud to be a trusted name in the home improvement and building trade, delivering an extensive range of brands and quality products at competitive prices, alongside best-in-class customer service. Its 230 stores support nationwide fulfilment from convenient locations throughout the UK and with an extended range online, it has everything you need, whether your project is big or small, or you’re an amateur DIY-er or a skilled trade professional. From concept to completion, plus all the finishing touches, Wickes can offer the goods, advice, guidance and knowledge, to help you feel house proud. For more information, please visit: www.wickes.co.uk

Wine52 is a wine discovery club which showcases a new region every month. From velvety reds to crisp whites, focusing on native grape varieties from iconic regions they ensure that there's a perfect pour for every occasion and palate preference. You'll receive a case of 3 full-sized bottles of wine curated by Wine52's experts which you can customise to taste with red-only, white-only or a mixed case. You'll also find two artisanal snacks in your first case and a copy of Glug magazine.

brands.name: York Gift Card

detail.digital_general_restrictions: Gift Cards can only be spent with approved merchants listed on the individual product page hosted on townandcitygiftcards.com
detail.description: The York Gift Card is the ultimate 'shop local' Gift Card and is part of the award-winning Town & City Gift Card network. The York Gift Card is packed with big brand retailers, restaurants and entertainment venues you know, and hundreds of amazing independent businesses you'll love - no other Gift Card can compete on choice. Plus, as cards are spent locally, it provides tangible support for local businesses in York, so you’re not only gifting unbeatable local choice you’re being a local hero too! The York Gift Card makes support for local simple.

brands.notes:
To view all participating local businesses that accept the York Gift Card, visit:

https://townandcitygiftcards.com/where-to-spend
Then select your town or city from the list.

Redemption Instructions:
To activate your gift card, download the free Love Local app from your app store and sign up using the same email linked to your everup account.

Once logged in:
1. Tap “Add a new gift card”
2. Tap “Activate a gift card”
3. Copy the 6-digit activation code from your everup-purchased gift card, paste it, and click “Activate gift card”.

To spend your gift card, you MUST first add it to your Apple or Google Wallet via the Love Local app.

You can then use it directly from your wallet when shopping in participating local businesses.

detail.description: We’ve opened more than 134 Italian Restaurants across the UK. Our aim? to stand out from the crowd. Each restaurant is a little bit different with a distinctly local feel, thanks to our ‘fresh talent’ collective of up and coming artist who help to create a unique atmosphere and dining experience. A dish will always come recommended, be it an Italian classic, an artisan inspired gelato or a freshly prepared local favourite. Zizzi currently has over 134 restaurants throughout the UK.
